1 sandwich roll,6 ounces cooked chicken,1/4 cup green pepper,4 grape tomatoes,4 slices English cucumber,6 Greek olives,3 slices red onion,,1 cup Romaine,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste,1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste,1/4 teaspoon dried oregano, or to taste,1/4 cup feta cheese,1/2 lemon, juiced,2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil,,
